TextView.android:text: Quran For All Muslims ... An application that displays the Qur'an in more than one language other than Arabic. The main purpose of the application is to help non-Arab users read the Qur'an. Each user is provided with a copy of the Qur'an in Arabic and another in his native language so that he does not have difficulty reading the verses of the Qur'an. The app has been equipped with voice and text search features to make it easier to find verses to read. When downloading and opening the app, you can easily copy the Qur'an in your native language and get some services such as keep favorite verses and Read daily important Doaa .
